/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. Power lines stretch across the sky, a common sight in many cities. Buildings of various sizes and designs fill the background, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of Beijing. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of depth to the scene.
